item.title: 谷歌交易流产显示反垄断对科技的长期影响
item.description: 最近几个月，谷歌对两家公司表现出了兴趣，其中任何一家都将成为这家互联网巨头有史以来最大的一笔收购。但两次交易均告失败。【原文：In recent months, Google showed interest in two companies, either of which would have been the biggest-ever purchase for the internet giant. And both times, the deals fell apart.】

item.title: 芝加哥公牛队和黑鹰队老板下注 70 亿美元购买房地产
item.description: 芝加哥两支最富传奇色彩的运动队背后的家族正联手在联合中心（United Center）周围开发价值 70 亿美元的房地产项目。【原文：The families behind two of Chicago’s most storied sports teams are joining forces for a $7 billion real estate development around the United Center, the arena that will host next month’s Democratic National Convention.】

item.title: 据说医疗用品巨头 Medline 将探索在 2025 年进行 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Medline Industries 公司正在探讨首次公开募股事宜，这家医疗用品巨头的估值可能高达 500 亿美元。【原文：Medline Industries Inc. is exploring an initial public offering that could value the medical supplies giant at as much as $50 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 达索航空公司称法国政局不稳令人担忧
item.description: 达索飞机公司（Dassault Aviation SA）首席执行官埃里克-特拉皮耶（Eric Trappier）说，法国政局不稳令人担忧，可能会增加航空企业面临的困难，因为航空业正努力解决供应链制约问题。【原文：French political instability is worrying and could add to the difficulties aviation firms face as the industry struggles with supply-chain constraints, said Dassault Aviation SA Chief Executive Officer Eric Trappier.】

item.title: 国库两年期债券拍卖会上的投资者需求创下新高
item.description: 投资者对美国财政部每月出售的两年期债券趋之若鹜，这有力地证明了他们对美联储今年开始降息的信心。【原文：Investors flocked to the US Treasury’s monthly sale of two-year notes in a powerful demonstration of faith in Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts beginning this year.】

item.title: Merlin Properties 筹集资金拓展数据中心业务
item.description: Merlin Properties Socimi SA 公司表示，它将举行一次股票出售，以筹集资金，为其数据中心业务的扩张提供资金。【原文：Merlin Properties Socimi SA said it will hold a share sale to raise capital to fund the expansion of its data center business.】

item.title: 喀麦隆发行 5.5 亿美元债券，加入非洲债券销售热潮
item.description: 喀麦隆周二出售了 5.5 亿美元的债券，这是非洲国家利用有利的市场条件进行新一轮融资的最新案例。【原文：Cameroon sold $550 million of bonds Tuesday, the latest in a wave of African countries taking advantage of benign market conditions to raise fresh financing.】

item.title: 以太币 ETF 交易额超过 5 亿美元，加密货币基金强势登场
item.description: 首批直接投资以太币的美国 ETF 交易量相对于首日亮相的基金而言较高，在开盘后的头几个小时内，10 亿美元的交易量就超过了一半。【原文：The first US ETFs that invest directly in Ether are posting relatively high trading volumes for first-day fund debuts, with more than half of one billion dollars changing hands in the first several hours after the market open.】

item.title: 特朗普的美元走弱承诺可能为比特币带来顺风
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普可能会在 11 月重返白宫，如果这位美国前总统得逞的话，美元可能会走软。一些分析家认为，这将有利于比特币。【原文：Donald Trump’s potential return to the White House in November may bring about a weaker dollar, if the former US president gets his way. Some analysts reckon that would be a benefit for Bitcoin.】

item.title: 美国银行任命布鲁纳为 TMT 投资银行部主管
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份内部备忘录，美国银行（Bank of America Corp）已任命凯文-布鲁纳（Kevin Brunner）为全球技术、媒体和电信投资银行业务主管。【原文：Bank of America Corp. has named Kevin Brunner as head of global technology, media and telecommunications investment banking, according to an internal memo seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 欧洲央行考虑将杠杆贷款调查需求减半至 70 亿欧元
item.description: 欧洲央行官员正在讨论要求银行增加约 70 亿欧元（76 亿美元）的杠杆贷款坏账准备金，这大约是其最初估计的一半，此前央行对该业务的深入审查引发了贷款人的反弹。【原文：European Central Bank officials are discussing asking banks to add about €7 billion ($7.6 billion) in provisions for leveraged loans going bad, roughly half what it had initially estimated, after its in-depth review of the business sparked a backlash among lenders.】

item.title: 暂停拥堵定价，纽约市公交系统再次面临预算危机
item.description: 推迟纽约市的拥堵收费计划迫使大都会运输局搁置价值 165 亿美元的资本改进项目，并可能打破该运输机构直至 2027 年的平衡预算。【原文：Delaying New York City’s congestion pricing plan forces the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to shelve $16.5 billion worth of capital improvements and likely shatters the transit agency’s balanced budgets through 2027.】

item.title: 哈德逊湾加入对冲基金，长期锁定投资者现金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，哈德逊湾资本管理公司（Hudson Bay Capital Management）是最新一家将投资者资金锁定更长时间的对冲基金。【原文：Hudson Bay Capital Management is the latest hedge fund locking up investor capital for longer, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 红龙虾继续推进堡垒收购要约
item.description: 在破产的海鲜连锁店 Red Lobster 未能获得更好的收购报价后，Fortress 投资集团更接近于收购 Red Lobster。【原文：Fortress Investment Group is closer to acquiring Red Lobster after the bankrupt seafood chain failed to net better offers for its business.】

item.title: DeFi 交易所 DYdX 就出售衍生品交易平台进行谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，DYdX 交易公司（DYdX Trading Inc.【原文：DYdX Trading Inc., the developer of the namesake decentralized finance exchange, is in talks to sell some of its derivatives trading software for an undisclosed amount to a consortium that includes some of the biggest market makers in crypto, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克称乌克兰不和可能导致燃料出口减少
item.description: 斯洛伐克说，如果饱受战争蹂躏的乌克兰继续受到制裁，那么它可能被迫削减对邻国（包括乌克兰）的燃料出口。【原文：Slovakia said it could be forced to cut fuel exports to neighboring countries — including Ukraine — if the war-ravaged nation maintains sanctions that have cut the flow of piped crude from Russia.】

item.title: 对投资者来说最重要的事情是什么？愚蠢的是经济
item.description:
在战略方面，美联储和经济增长压倒了政治

。【原文：

The Fed and growth trounce politics when it comes to strategy

】

item.title: 印度对投资于 GIFT 城市部分基金的外国人免税
item.description: 印度对通过古吉拉特邦国际金融科技城（GIFT City）投资交易所交易基金和其他零售计划的非居民印度人和外国散户投资者免税。【原文：India has exempted non-resident Indians and foreign retail investors who invest in exchange-traded funds and other retail plans through Gujarat International Finance Tec-City, or GIFT City, from taxes.】

item.title: 博茨瓦纳向公民兜售新矿业公司 24% 的股份
item.description: 博茨瓦纳政府将鼓励新的采矿企业向公民提供购买多达 24% 的项目股份的权利，在这些项目中，国家尚未行使其购买股份的权利。【原文：Botswana’s government will encourage new mining ventures to offer citizens the right to buy as much as 24% of projects in which the state hasn’t exercised its right to purchase a stake.】

item.title: 南非 Eskom 公司计划用可再生能源和核能取代煤炭
item.description: 南非 Eskom 控股有限公司（Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd.）计划与私营电力开发商竞争，在未来十年内，随着总发电量的增长，逐步用更清洁的技术取代煤炭。【原文：South Africa’s Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. plans to compete with private power developers by gradually replacing coal with cleaner technologies as overall capacity grows over the next decade.】

item.title: 在美联储减息的希望中，住宅建筑商股票疯狂反弹
item.description: 住宅建筑类股票的狂热涨势使该集团有望在今年最好的一个月里取得佳绩，但这一涨势几乎没有停止的迹象。【原文：A torrid rally in homebuilder stocks that’s put the group on track for its best month this year shows few signs of stopping.】

item.title: 花旗银行在气候适应融资领域看到 "重大机遇
item.description: 花旗集团表示，如果不能以限制气候变化所需的速度减少温室气体排放，就意味着需要更多资金来保护家庭、城市和基础设施免受极端天气事件的影响。【原文：Citigroup Inc. says a failure to cut greenhouse gas emissions at the pace needed to limit climate change means more capital is required to protect homes, cities and infrastructure from extreme weather events.】

item.title: 奥地利写字楼开发商 Imfarr 在维也纳申请破产
item.description: 奥地利房地产开发商 Imfarr Beteiligungs GmbH 周二向维也纳一家法院申请破产，理由是融资成本上升和办公空间需求下降。【原文：Austrian real estate developer Imfarr Beteiligungs GmbH filed for insolvency in a Vienna court on Tuesday, citing higher financing costs and a drop in demand for office spaces.】

item.title: 艾略特投资组合经理塞雷伊离开伦敦激进主义公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）驻伦敦的投资组合经理帕维尔-塞雷伊（Pawel Serej）已经离开了这家激进主义公司。【原文：Elliott Investment Management’s Pawel Serej, a London-based portfolio manager, has left the activist firm, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛和 Alphabet 支持加拿大法律软件公司融资 9 亿美元
item.description: 法律软件供应商 Clio 在新一轮融资中获得了 30 亿美元的估值，高盛资产管理公司和 Alphabet 公司的风险投资部门成为新的投资者。【原文：Legal software provider Clio clinched a $3 billion valuation in a funding round that brings in Goldman Sachs Asset Management and Alphabet Inc.’s venture arm as new investors.】

item.title: 莫迪大选后的预算向选民的经济担忧低头
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的新政府概述了在主要政治盟友所支持的失业和项目上的巨额开支，这是执政党在上个月的选举中遭受惩罚性挫折后，迄今为止对印度政治格局变化的最高调承认。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s new government outlined vast spending on unemployment and projects favored by key political allies, in the most high-profile acknowledgment to date by the ruling party of India’s changed political landscape following a punishing election setback last month.】

item.title: 富国银行聘请德意志银行的周负责管理技术并购团队
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. has hired Tom Cho as head of its team advising technology companies on mergers and acquisitions, according to a person familiar with the matter, as it continues to strengthen its corporate and investment bank.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构成立打击内幕交易小组
item.description: 澳大利亚证券监管机构将成立一个新的团队，专门负责内幕交易调查，加大力度打击市场操纵行为。【原文：Australia’s securities regulator will establish a new team dedicated to insider trading investigations as it ramps up efforts to crack down on market manipulation.】

item.title: 乌克兰与 GDP 挂钩的债务达到战争开始以来的最高水平
item.description: 在政府承诺偿还部分债务后，乌克兰的国内生产总值（GDP）指数回升至 2022 年初以来的最高点。【原文：Ukraine’s GDP warrants rallied to the highest since early 2022 after the government promised to make some of its debt payments.】

item.title: 欧洲最大电动汽车电池制造商因需求减少考虑开发新产品
item.description: 在电动汽车需求疲软的情况下，欧洲最大的电动汽车电池生产商可能会涉足为利用可再生能源的家庭建造储能设施。【原文：The biggest producer of batteries for electric vehicles in Europe may branch out to build energy storage facilities for households harnessing renewable energy, amid weak demand for e-cars.】
